lead_paragraph: A 28-year-old doctor has been arrested on charges of giving a woman a fatal dose of chloroform and then raping her in a California motel last August, the authorities said today. After a bail hearing here this afternoon, the suspect, Samson G. Dubria, said through a court-appointed lawyer that he was not guilty and eager to return to California to contest the murder and rape charges. He was arrested Thursday night.

headline.main: Doctor Arrested in Rape and Murder of Woman
